about_the_game:
“Two children are confronted with the harsh reality of the place they have just arrived in. They have no choice but to try to escape. Faced with obstacles, their best hope lies in mutual support. Will they make it through a journey that will bring them closer together, reveal secrets as mysterious as they are terrifying, and, above all, save them from a grim fate?”

ESCAPE WITH YOUR NEWFOUND COMPANION

Play as Lois and Sam, two unlikely friends who must work together to escape this twisted place.

HUMANOIDS DEFORMED TO ADAPT TO THEIR GRIM LABOR

Be careful, you’re not alone. Strange monstrosities lurk in this place. They were once human like you, but this place changed them. Now, they’re merely shadows of what they once were, and they won’t hesitate to put you back in line. Don’t get caught, or you might end up like them.

WITHIN A DARK AND DEADLY ENVIRONMENT HIDING A HEAVY SECRET

Traverse the facility and explore a variety of environments. Each one presents its own unique challenges and dangers.

WILL YOU ESCAPE THIS PLACE, OR END UP LIKE THE OTHERS ?

NB: Double Shoulders is a graduation game made in one year by a team of 9 students.

Thank you for your consideration regarding potential bugs and performance issues.

content_descriptors.notes: Double Shoulders contains violent elements that primarily focus on the main characters, who are children. While their deaths can be brutal and violent, the game does not feature grotesque gore or dismemberment. The violent scenes are suggestive and serve the story, without aiming to shock or provoke excessively. It is important to note that players may encounter moments of tension and emotional distress that contribute to the dark and oppressive atmosphere of the game. However, no explicitly shocking content such as sexual assaults, alcohol or drug abuse, or self-harm is present. We advise players sensitive to such content to consider this approach before embarking on the adventure.

name: Double Shoulders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

short_description: Double Shoulders is a two player action-adventure game. You take control of Lois and Sam, two kids trying to escape from a strange place filled with dangers and challenges. You'll have to work together to get out of this place alive.
